channel.title: Glitchy Hits
channel.description:
So I've just been working on special attacks, and I just noticed there's something wrong with the hits shown.
So instead of it showing a 0, in the blue sort of splash thing. It Shows 200+ I don't even know where to begin looking to even attempt to fix this, so any help? :/
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/j97hj9.gif[/img]
(Sorry about the low quality(Ish) Gif image >.>)
Edit: Btw the base is Czar.
